'''''Minecraft: The Manga'' Volume 12''' is the twelfth {{W|tankōbon}} volume of the ''[[Minecraft: The Manga]]'' series.

== Chapters ==
*56. Get a Powerful Sword!! (強力な剣を手に入れろ!!, ''Kyōryokuna Ken o Te ni Irero!!'')
*57. Abyss's Hideout, Discovered!! (アビスの隠れ家、発見!!, ''Abisu no Kakurega, Hakken!!'')
*58. Danger!! The Wither of Destruction and Creation!! (脅威!! 崩壊と創造のウィザー!!, ''Kyōi!! Hōkai to Sōzō no Wizā!!'')
*59. Team Up!! Full-Power Father-Son Crafting!! (共闘!! 渾身の親子クラフト!!, ''Kyōtō!! Konshin no Oyako Kurafuto!!'')
*60. Goodbye Father, Embarking on a New Journey!! (父との別れ、新たな旅路へ!!, ''Chichi to no Wakare, Aratana Tabiji e!!'')
*61. Recover the Precious Treasure!! (大事な宝をとりもどせ!!, ''Daijina Takara o Torimodose!!'')
